ygData.subject: Re: Look who's back
ygData.msgSnippet:
Do you know just who the hell I am?  First of all, I ll have you know that I
earned respect around here a LOOOOOONG time ago.  But now, with the likes of
you,

Do you know just who the hell I am?  First of all, I'll have you know that =
I
earned respect around here a LOOOOOONG time ago.  But now, with the likes=
 of
you, looks like I'm going to have to through a whole new generation.  L=
ook,
I know this RPG a whole lot more than you do, and trust me, I'm an Imp=
act
Player here.  And as for king of the universe, no, I'm not king of the
=
universe, and I don't think I am either.  I'd rather not be king of the
uni=
verse, because I'm a highly name in this RPG.  You just don't know me
well.=
  Don't  let my words fool you, I'm a real friendly guy, you just gotta
not=
 get on my bad side(I have a  bad side!?).  I  didn't mean to sound like
so=
me arrogant asshole in my first post on my return.  My appologies to
anybod=
y who took that wrong.

P.S.  Hi KSLawdogg!  Hi Rudra!  Hi Azure!  You guys remember me???

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: July 31, 2002 08:23:48 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Look who's back

Okay, number one, the newbies here KNOW PERFECTLY WELL how to=20
roleplay, so your complaint on that is void.  Number two, you have to=20
EARN respect, and you're doing a piss-poor job thus far.  Number=20
three, you need to shut up, start r-p'ing, and stop complaining about=20
what others are doing, or I expect the council's going to take the=20
same measures with you as they did with Tankor.

Who do you think you are, anyway, the king of the universe?

If your answer is anywhere near "yes" then get the fuck off this=20
board!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> Booyah!  The Lurkerman is back, and I'm better than eeeveeerr.  Now=20
that I've finally returned from my long hiatus, there's going to be=20
BIG change around here.  Courtesty of yours truly, LurkerAbyss. =20
First of all, I will be respected by EVERYONE.  Including the likes=20
of lowly newbies to the authorities themselves, the council.  Second=20
of all, I can't be bothered with pathetic newbies who don't know how=20
to do this.  So, there will be cleaning up around  here as well.  And=20
last, but not least, do NOT even THINK of whining at me, yelling at=20
me, or insulting  me.  The Lurker era of NBWRPG begins right about=20
NOW!


Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

Click here to find your contact lenses!

Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
